public static class Func.HandleFunc extends Object implements Func
A function extern implemented by wrapping a method handle.

  • Constructor Details

    • HandleFunc

      public HandleFunc(@Nullable io.github.eutro.wasm2j.api.types.ExternType.Func type, MethodHandle handle)
      Construct a new handle function, with the given type.

      If the type is not provided, the function will not have a specific WebAssembly function type, as this cannot be inferred from the type of the method handle alone.

      Parameters:
      type - The type.
      handle - The handle.

      Returns:
      The new instance.

    • handle

      public MethodHandle handle()
      Description copied from interface: Func
      Get the MethodHandle to the function.

      The rules for converting a WebAssembly function [p1*] -> [r1*] to a Java method signature (p2*)r2 are as follows:

      • Every parameter p1 of p1* is mapped directly to a parameter p2 in p2* according to the rules given in ValType.
      • If r1* is empty (the function has no results), r2 is void.
      • If r1* is exactly one value, r2 is its conversion as given in ValType.
      • If r1* is more than 1 value, but homogenous (every r1 is identical), then r2 is a Java array of the converted value according to ValType.
      • If r1* is more than 1 value, and heterogeneous (not all of the same type), then r2 is Object[], containing every result boxed.
      Specified by:
      handle in interface Func
      Returns:
      The handle.
      See Also:
      • BasicCallingConvention

    • getType

      public @NotNull io.github.eutro.wasm2j.api.types.ExternType.Func getType()
      Description copied from interface: Func
      Get the type of this function.

      If the function was created from a Java method (by ExternVal.func(MethodHandle) or ExternVal.func(Class, Object)), then it is not possible to infer the exact WebAssembly type of the function. In this case, the returned ExternType.Func will have its ExternType.Func.params and ExternType.Func.results as null.

      If a Java function is desired to have a specific type, it should be constructed with Func.HandleFunc directly.

      Specified by:
      getType in interface ExternVal
      Specified by:
      getType in interface Func
      Returns:
      The type of the function.
